Class CustomerFrame

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
java.awt.Window
java.awt.Frame
javax.swing.JFrame
CustomerFrame
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class CustomerFrame
extends javax.swing.JFrame
This class has only a no argument constructor, no methods, 13 private final variables and 1 private variable.
Author:
Max Finch

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private javax.swing.JPanel bottomPanel
    This JPanel houses exchangePanel and deleteAccount(JButton) at the bottom of the CustomerFrame
    private int comboBoxGlobalIndex
    This int is used to keep track of the customer that's selected.
    private javax.swing.JComboBox<Customer> customerInfoJComboBox
    This JComboBox is used to select the customer that can exchange SWD dollars, delete their account and have their information displayed by customerInfoLabel.
    private javax.swing.JLabel customerInfoLabel
    This JLabel is used to display the selected customers Account information by the combo box
    private javax.swing.JPanel customerInfoPanel
    This JPanel consists of customerInfoLabel and customerInfoJComboBox.
    private Customer[] customers
    This array contains all the Customers that are created with the CustomerFrame.
    private javax.swing.JButton deleteAccount
    This JButton "deletes" the current selected Customer and triggers a pop-up window showing customer balance in USD.
    private javax.swing.JTextField exchangeField
    This JTextField takes in the amount of SWD that the user wants to exchange from the selected account.
    private javax.swing.JLabel exchangeLabel
    This JLabel displays the text "Exchange SWD" underneath the exchangeField.
    private javax.swing.JPanel exchangePanel
    This JPanel consists of exchangeField and exchangeLabel.
    private javax.swing.JTextField rateField
    This JTextField takes in a new exchange rate provided by the user and changes the rate for all customers in its actionPerformed method by calling Customer.setRate().
    private javax.swing.JLabel rateLabel
    This JLabel displays the current exchange rate underneath the rateField.
    private javax.swing.JPanel ratePanel
    This JPanel consists of rateField and rateLabel.
    private javax.swing.JPanel topPanel
    This JPanel houses customerInfoPanel and ratePanel at the top of the CustomerFrame

  • Field Details

    • customerInfoLabel

      private final javax.swing.JLabel customerInfoLabel
      This JLabel is used to display the selected customers Account information by the combo box

    • customerInfoJComboBox

      private final javax.swing.JComboBox<Customer> customerInfoJComboBox
      This JComboBox is used to select the customer that can exchange SWD dollars, delete their account and have their information displayed by customerInfoLabel.

    • comboBoxGlobalIndex

      private int comboBoxGlobalIndex
      This int is used to keep track of the customer that's selected. It is utilized in the ItemListener for customerInfoJComboBox, ActionListener for rateField, exchangeField and deleteAccount

    • customerInfoPanel

      private final javax.swing.JPanel customerInfoPanel
      This JPanel consists of customerInfoLabel and customerInfoJComboBox. This JPanel takes up the top left and top middle of the CustomerFrame.

    • topPanel

      private final javax.swing.JPanel topPanel
      This JPanel houses customerInfoPanel and ratePanel at the top of the CustomerFrame

    • bottomPanel

      private final javax.swing.JPanel bottomPanel
      This JPanel houses exchangePanel and deleteAccount(JButton) at the bottom of the CustomerFrame

    • exchangePanel

      private final javax.swing.JPanel exchangePanel
      This JPanel consists of exchangeField and exchangeLabel. This JPanel takes up the bottom left of the CustomerFrame.

    • exchangeLabel

      private final javax.swing.JLabel exchangeLabel
      This JLabel displays the text "Exchange SWD" underneath the exchangeField.

    • exchangeField

      private final javax.swing.JTextField exchangeField
      This JTextField takes in the amount of SWD that the user wants to exchange from the selected account.

    • rateField

      private final javax.swing.JTextField rateField
      This JTextField takes in a new exchange rate provided by the user and changes the rate for all customers in its actionPerformed method by calling Customer.setRate().

    • ratePanel

      private final javax.swing.JPanel ratePanel
      This JPanel consists of rateField and rateLabel. This JPanel takes up the top right of the CustomerFrame.

    • rateLabel

      private final javax.swing.JLabel rateLabel
      This JLabel displays the current exchange rate underneath the rateField.

    • deleteAccount

      private final javax.swing.JButton deleteAccount
      This JButton "deletes" the current selected Customer and triggers a pop-up window showing customer balance in USD.

    • customers

      private final Customer[] customers
      This array contains all the Customers that are created with the CustomerFrame.

  • Constructor Details

    • CustomerFrame

      public CustomerFrame()
      No argument constructor Sets the layout to GridLayout with 2 rows, 1 column. The topPanel and bottomPanel will stack on top of each other.
